text: Krishna Prasad Sitaula () is a Nepali politician, belonging to the Nepali Congress. Krishna Sitaula is known for playing an important role during the comprehensive peace accord. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Nepali Congress politicians from Koshi Province Category:Members of the 2nd Nepalese Constituent Assembly Category:Nepal MPs 1991–1994 Category:Nepal MPs 1999–2002 Category:1946 births
title: Krishna Prasad Sitaula
